siteMetadata.title: Serge van den Oever's weblog
siteMetadata.description: Personal weblog by Serge van den Oever.

frontmatter.title: Install Sitecore 9.1 in a breeze
frontmatter.spoiler: I would prefer to have a Sitecore installation on a VM so I only put it "on"

frontmatter.title: Umbrella for Sitecore JSS
frontmatter.spoiler: Umbrella for Sitecore JSS is our vision on how a website should be developed and hosted while using the JSS SDK and Sitecore as a headless CMS.

frontmatter.title: Serving static files from GitHub
frontmatter.spoiler: When you need to request files from GitHub with the correct mime-types GitHub itself is not the best place.

frontmatter.title: Render Sitecore 9.1 JSS site using separate node server
frontmatter.spoiler: Use a custom Node based server to render Sitecore 9.1 JSS pages.

frontmatter.title: Developing React components in Typescript with Sitecore JSS 9.1
frontmatter.spoiler: At my company we use TypeScript for front-end development where possible. In my first steps in using JSS I wanted to build my first component in TypeScript, which did not work out of the box. In this post I describe how I got ypeScript compilation working.

frontmatter.title: Weblog deployment to a static Microsoft Azure website
frontmatter.spoiler: This weblog is created with GatsbyJS and after build results in a static website that can be hosted anywhere. I host my weblog on a Microsoft Azure static website. In this post I provide links to how to set up an Azure static website, and how to automate the deployment based on commits to the Github repository.

frontmatter.title: Serge's first blog post!?
frontmatter.spoiler: That mandatory first blog post on my own "blogging platform". After blogging for years on http://weblogs.asp.net/soever and some endeavors with the Medium blogging platform.
